Package com.example.appointment.controller

package com.example.appointment.controller

This package implements the Controller of the Model-View-Controller design pattern for the appointment scheduler. It has multiple controllers that control the functionality for all the different pages. This includes the MainController which sets-up the main appointments page, the ViewCustomersController which displays customers, and all the other controllers this program uses. This also includes multiple interfaces that separate some of the more complex functionalities from the controllers.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.appointment
    This package implements the Model of the Model-View-Controller design pattern for the appointment scheduler.
    com.example.appointment.exceptions
    This package implements unique exceptions that are widely used throughout the appointment scheduler program.
  • Class
    Description
    AddAppointmentController
    A controller that loads the Add Appointment page allowing users to add new appointments to the database.
    AddCustomerController
    A controller that loads the Add Customer page allowing users to add new customers to the database.
    AddListenerInterface
    An interface that adds a listener to a passed in JavaFX object so that the label is displayed revealing an error message, and the JavaFX object will change to red, until a valid text entry is entered.
    AddressCheckInterface
    An interface implements a method to check if an address is valid or not.
    AppointmentAlertsInterface
    An interface that is used to create alerts for if an appointment is expiring within 15 minutes of login.
    AppointmentDataInterface
    An interface that is used to load data for the Add Appointment, and Modify Appointment controllers.
    ComboBoxListenerInterface
    An interface that adds a listener to a passed in ComboBox so that text that is entered can be validated.
    ContactScheduleReportController
    A controller that loads the Contact reports scene.
    Controller
    A base class shared by all the controllers.
    GetAppointmentsInterface
    An interface that with that allows the program to access appointments from the database.
    GetCustomersInterface
    An interface that with that allows the program to access customers from the database.
    LoginController
    Controller that provides the user with a page to login and change their language at.
    MainController
    A Controller for the main page of the program.
    ModifyAppointmentController
    A controller that loads the Modify Appointment page allowing users to modify selected appointments from the database.
    ModifyCustomerController
    A controller that loads the Modify Customer page allowing users to modify the data of existing customers to the database.
    PhoneNumberCheckInterface
    An interface that implements a method to check if a phone number is valid or not.
    PostalCodeCheckInterface
    An interface that implements a method to check if a postal code is valid or not.
    ReportsController
    A base class shared by all the report controllers.
    SQLControllerInterface
    An interface that contains methods that are used in all controllers that will directly access the SQL database.
    TotalCustomersCountryReportController
    A controller that loads the Total Customer Country Reports scene.
    TotalCustomersMonthReportController
    A controller that loads the Total Customer Month Reports scene.
    TotalCustomersTypeReportController
    A controller that loads the Total Customer Type Reports scene.
    ViewCustomersController
    A Controller for the view customer page of the program.
